General.Name: Guangdong Haomei New Material Co Lt
General.Description: Guangdong Haomei New Materials Co.,Ltd researches, develops, manufactures and sells aluminum profiles in China. The company offers automotive lightweight materials, including anti-collision beams, battery trays, shock absorber brackets, power brackets, by-frames, and motor housing products; doors and windows systems; aluminum alloy building profiles; aluminum alloy building profiles; and industrial aluminum and forging products, including machined and round bar, and extruded aluminum square tube that are used in traffic, electronic communication, infrastructure, woodworking machinery, high-end equipment, mechanical, and electrical fields. Guangdong Haomei New Materials Co.,Ltd was founded in 1991 and is based in Qingyuan, China.
